author: @larskristo
name: Braideyes
description: A man who sewed flesh over his eye sockets to hide his gaze from the world. Only a few small holes remain, allowing him to see while shutting everyone else out. His face, a grotesque tapestry of stitched skin, reflects his desperate desire for isolation.

author: @larskristo
name: Trollto
description: An idiotic troll with literal shit for brains  that spill out of his vacant eyes. He tends to slip on the fecal matter that spills out of its eyes, tumbling and flailing in a grotesque dance. With his head a void of thought, he is driven purely by primal urges, a dangerously unpredictable force of bruteness.

author: @larskristo
name: Deep Blue
description: Deep Blue embodies a pit of sadness and depression. His presence pulls you into a melancholic abyss, a dark state of mind so profound it drains all joy and hope. Those who linger too close find themselves ensnared by despair, some driven to the depths of madness and suicide.

author: @larskristo
name: Musically Possessed
description: A specter of an old musician who yearned for his music to be eternal. He sold his soul to the devil, cursed to play forever for anyone who comes near. The centuries have driven him mad, warping his once-beautiful melodies into a cacophony of discordant notes and jarring noises. His haunting performance now only brings desperation to escape the tormenting sounds, a twisted fulfillment of his wish.

author: @larskristo
name: Gray Bore
description: The ghost of the most boring entity in the universe. So dull that it drains the very color and joy from anyone who comes too close, leaving them lifeless and gray. Its presence bleaches the surroundings, stripping all vibrancy and leaving behind a desolate, colorless wasteland.

author: @larskristo
name: Dead Jesus
description: The spirit of the one they once called the savior. The story of his survival was a hoax; this is the real specter, lingering in eternal unrest. As in life, he possesses the gift of gab. His boring speeches can lull you into a deep, dreamless sleep.

author: @larskristo
name: Melting Shriek
description: A creature whose scream melts the very meat off bone. Its horrific cry is so powerful that even the reverberations have affected it, causing its own body to partially melt. Though spared the full force of its scream, it is a grotesque, half-melted horror, its flesh perpetually dripping and reforming in a nightmarish cycle of decay.

author: @larskristo
name: Skeptical Idiot
description: A man whose relentless doubt has left him emotionally frozen and perpetually confused. He questioned everything until his mind could no longer discern reality from delusion, leaving him a chaotic, violent mess. Trapped in a bewildering fog of his own making, he lashes out at a world he can no longer comprehend.

author: @larskristo
name: Hole Head
description: An unfortunate fool who, in a fit of rage, smashed his own head with a hammer. The blow left him with permanent brain damage, his mind forever trapped in that moment of fury. Now, he wanders in a perpetual state of enraged confusion, a grim testament to his own reckless wrath.

author: @larskristo
name: Compost Composer
description: A deceased musician whose work was so reviled in life that he turned to composing music with his own excrement in death. He creates grotesque symphonies of bodily sounds, each note a foul stench that pollutes even the cleanest spaces. His compositions are a cacophony of disgust.

author: @larskristo
name: Blind Eye
description: A cunning man who pretends to be blind, using this guise to his deadly advantage. With a charming facade of helplessness, he lures his unsuspecting victims closer, only to revel in their demise with a sinister glee. A twisted serial killer, he finds his greatest joy in the hunt and the kill

author: @larskristo
name: Wormroot
description: A man so obsessed with worms that he began to infect himself with them to rot away parts of himself he no longer desired. Piece by piece, he let the worms devour his nose, ears, eyes, and limbs, all in a twisted effort to transform himself into one of them. Now, his body writhes with the very worms he sought to emulate.

author: @larskristo
name: Serow Tayh
description: A grotesque entity born from the accumulated shit at a bottomless pit of a sewer. Formed from years of undigested plastic and shit shat by humanity, this abomination eventually came to life. Emerging from the depths, it swims out in search of food, driven by an insatiable hunger to nourish itself.

author: @larskristo
name: Pentahead
description: Satan's lap human, a creature that has spent centuries at the feet of the Dark Lord. Stripped of all humanity, it is reduced to its most primal self, driven by an obsessive love for Satan. Despite the endless torture and the pentagram scarred into its flesh—a mark Lucifer continuously digs into when bored—its devotion knows no bounds. Pentahead will go to any length to protect its master, a twisted testament to its undying loyalty.

author: @larskristo
name: Grump
description: an ancient soul condemned to an eternity in hell, where every annoyance sparks violent rage. His irritation fuels an endless cycle of grumpiness, each outburst making him even more irritable. Trapped in a never-ending spiral of frustration and fury.

author: @larskristo
name: Screaming Testicle
description: A creature with a bald, wrinkled head and a name earned from his grotesque testicular appearance. Centuries in hell have rotted away his bottom jaw and tongue, leaving him unable to speak. All he can do to communicate is scream, a haunting, endless wail that echoes through the infernal realms,.

author: @larskristo
name: Mortified Babyface
description: A grotesque being born from a tragic death in infancy but somehow grown to full size in hell. His face remains that of a baby, and so does his mind, but his strength is immense. Obsessed with obtaining mother's milk, he will stop at nothing to satisfy his craving, a twisted and powerful child eternally driven by an infant's need.

author: @larskristo
name: Slashhead
description: A tormented soul who arrived in hell bearing the knife wounds that ended his life. His face a grotesque canvas of scars. Though he exudes a facade of niceness, he is a hypocrite of the highest order, ready to stab you in the back literally at the first opportunity. His treachery is legendary, a twisted testament to his eternal damnation.

author: @larskristo
name: Gloom Pillow
description: A creature so deeply depressed that it sleeps through eternity to avoid the harshness of reality. Blissfully unaware that it crossed into the afterlife centuries ago, it now resides in hell, driven to madness by the passage of time. Should you disturb its slumber, beware: this once gentle soul will erupt in a fit of aggression, fiercely defending its perpetual, melancholic repose.

author: @larskristo
name: Catbat
description: A feral amalgamation of cat, bat, and human. This grotesque creature is perpetually on edge, ready to attack if frightened, hungry, tired, or simply because it exists. Its unpredictable nature makes it a constant threat. Stay away, for this beast knows no peace and offers none in return.

author: @larskristo
name: Molten Rot
description: A creature whose centuries in hell have left its face rotted away to nothing. This ancient soul, having endured endless torment, has mastered sorcery, learning the secret ways to defend itself from the hostile spirits that surround it. Beware, for Molten Rot wields dark magic with a decayed awarness.

author: @larskristo
name: Shroomp
description: In shadowed visage, a spectral skull emerges, Whispering dark secrets from the realm of the dead. A haunting presence, eternally bound.

author: @larskristo
name: Kurt
description: A tormented soul who took his own face off with a shotgun blast in life, losing all his blonde hair during his time in hell. He attempts to sing, but without lips, his efforts result in only screams and grunts. Though he smells like a clean spirit, he is anything but; his breath reeks, and he vomits lithium on anyone who comes near, pacifying them in a grotesque mockery of serenity.
